marklogic.body:
Way to go Chucky, pat yourself on the back for helping to push another useless law through NY State. You continue to excel at Burning taxpayer dollars for pork barrel pet projects.
This bill does nothing to solve the numerous problems this State has with unemployment and skyrocketing taxes. NY can crumble and all its businesses and residents can move out, but if the NY lawmakers pass more bills Banning things, it's all good. What a pity.
